task: Explore the AnkiDroid page to understand its features.
task_end_condition: The task is known to be completed when fufu has interacted with various elements on the AnkiDroid page.

working_memory.description: Touch on a button that has text "AnkiDroid"
By touching the button labeled "AnkiDroid," the screen has changed to an Introduction page with new text views explaining Anki's features and options to start or sync with AnkiWeb.
Touch on a button that has text "开始"

By touching the "开始" button, the screen transitioned from an introduction page to a permissions page, where new textviews explain the permissions required for AnkiDroid to function and new buttons are available for adjusting settings. (page changed from Introduction to Permissions)
Touch on a button that has resource_id "switch_widget"
The button with resource_id "switch_widget" has disappeared from the screen, and new textviews and buttons related to the Spa feature have been added. (page changed from Introduction to Permissions)
The button was replaced with a new button labeled "switch_widget" and the screen content changed to focus on permissions related to file access for AnkiDroid.

The actions taken by fufu seem to be somewhat repetitive, touching the same widget multiple times without exploring other available options. fufu needs to explore the new widgets on the Permissions page that have not been interacted with yet to understand their roles and features.
Touch on a button that has text "所有文件访问权限, 将牌组集合保存在一个即使卸载了应用也不会被删除的安全所在"

By touching the button with the text "所有文件访问权限, 将牌组集合保存在一个即使卸载了应用也不会被删除的安全所在", the screen has transitioned from the Permissions page to the DeckPicker page, where the interface now displays options related to deck management and card addition. (page changed from Permissions to DeckPicker)
Touch on a button that has resource_id "fab_main"
The "fab_main" button was already present on the previous screen but now appears again on the current screen after other buttons have been added.
Touch on a button that has text "获取共享牌组"

By touching the button labeled "获取共享牌组," the screen has transitioned from the DeckPicker to the SharedDecks screen, where you can now access a list of shared decks and various language options for download. (page changed from DeckPicker to SharedDecks)
Touch on a button that has text "Anatomy"
